---

Asserts that a value is never.

## Import

```ts
import { assertNever } from "@alchemy/common";
```

## Parameters

### \_x

`never`

- The value to assert.

### msg

`string`

- The message to throw if the value is not never.

## Returns

`never`
Always throws an error.
